title: Taxonomy Labels

fields.label: Afterschool Program Categories
fields.name: afterschool_program_categories
fields.instructions: The label for the After School Program Categories that includes Arts, Academic Support, Sports, etc.

fields.label: Age Groups
fields.name: age_groups
fields.instructions: The label for the Age Group taxonomy (Baby, Toddler, etc.)

fields.label: Borough
fields.name: borough
fields.instructions: The label or the Borough taxonomy (Bronx, Manhattan, etc.)

fields.label: Program Categories
fields.name: program_categories
fields.instructions: The label for Program Categories (Cash and Expenses, Child Care, etc.)

fields.label: Summer Program Categories
fields.name: summer_program_categories
fields.instructions: The label for Summer Program Categories (Arts, Community, etc.)

fields.label: Summer Activity Types
fields.name: summer_activity_types
fields.instructions: The label for Summer Activity Types (Program+Camp, Work+Internship, etc.)

description: Re-assign the label for taxonomies. If left empty, the label will be remain at its default.
